products.name: Godanti Bhasma
products.short_desc: Pure Godanti Bhasma for medicinal & ayurvedic use.
products.long_desc: Godanti Bhasma is a classical Ayurvedic preparation obtained from gypsum (calcium sulfate). It is used in various Ayurvedic formulations for medicinal applications. Prepared by traditional calcination, it is offered in HDPE drums and standardized for quality.

products.name: Aloe Vera Juice
products.short_desc: Pure Aloe Vera Juice for wellness & cosmetic applications.
products.long_desc: A refreshing aloe vera juice prepared from Aloe vera leaf gel and packed hygienically. Offered in bottles; ideal for wellness beverages and cosmetic formulations.

products.name: Aloe Vera Gel
products.short_desc: Aloe Vera Gel for cosmetic and personal-care formulations.
products.long_desc: Smooth, refreshing aloe vera gel prepared from Aloe vera leaf gel and processed for cosmetic use. Offered in jars/drums; ideal for creams, gels and personal-care applications.

products.name: Shilajit Resin
products.short_desc: Shilajit Resin for ayurvedic & wellness formulations.
products.long_desc: Purified Shilajit resin (Asphaltum) sourced from high ranges; supplied in HDPE drums/jars for ayurvedic and wellness applications. Typical shelf life 24 months when stored in a cool, dry place away from moisture.
